author: _shemnon
content:
In getting the testnet prepared we discovered (different) bugs in Geth and Nethermind around EIP-7698, the contract creation EIP.  In a great twist of irony this is one feature that the road map has us removing in testnet-2.

What are peoples opinions in moving TXCREATE from testnet-2 into testnet-1, and dropping EIP-7698 earlier?
That would move all breaking changes into the next testnet and make testnet-2 + into feature add only testnets.
Basically the argument is why fix and test code that we already plan to delete?
